name: Crazy Drop.
description:
Crazy Drop is an addicting one-touch color matching skill game. Download right NOW to test your brain's reflexes against the world! Do you have what it takes to defeat your brain?

Features

> One-touch addictive gameplay
> Tap to move the line
> Match the colors to earn a point
> Improve your brain function while having fun
> Most importantly.... BEAT all your friends!

Stay Connected

Twitter: https://twitter.com/tastypillgames
